entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
